about_the_game:
Stand firm against the darkness and assume the mantle of a Paladin to bring swift and glorious justice to the battlefield with the all-new Hammer melee weapon. Smite your enemies with ground-shattering attacks and protect your allies with powerful shields and buffs.

This DLC features the all-new Hammer melee weapon, six new upgrade cards, and new cosmetics:
  • Weapon: Hammer
  • Hat: Paladin's Helmet
  • Cape: Paladin's Cape
  • Tunic: Paladin's Chainmail
  • Emote: Victory Lap
